subject: Re: Please add equipment to RAM Equipment website

full_threads.body:
Hi Peta,

It's okay. We have already added it in "Draft" so you can edit the specification in there anytime.

Here's the link: https://ramequipment.com.au/?post_type=product&p=7613&preview=true

Let us know if you would like further changes.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica

If you haven't started this, please don't worry, the specifications are literally the same as the SVL95 track loader so we might just alter the details for this.

Thanks

Peta

@rica product added, save as draft
https://ramequipment.com.au/?post_type=product&p=7613&preview=true

time: 20mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Thank you Rica, I appreciate this.

We have another machine.

It's a Kubota SVL97-2 Track Loader - which goes under skid steers.

Features:

Powerful hydraulic system
Unique vertical lift design
Standard two speed travel
Excellent 360 visibility
Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF) and Selective Catalytic Reduction (SCR) meet the latest Tier4 diesel emissions

Thank you.

Peta

Hi Peta,

Hope all is well. Confirming that we have added the equipment to the site. They are all in "Draft". To access them using the link below, please log in to the site's wp-admin dashboard.

Here are the links:

Let us know if you would like further changes.

time: 1hr

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Team


I have a few items that need to be added to the website please (if you could please get it to draft and I will complete the rest - as per the previous requests!)


Skid Steer:
  • John Deere 331G - spec sheet link
  • https://www.deere.com.au/assets/pdfs/common/products/compact-track-loaders/compact-track-loaders-mid-frame-large-frame-g-series-au-dkagctll.pdf
  • Page 6 of the attachment for skid steers attached


Grader: (please note that the grader needs to go in as a new section under hire equipment):
  • John Deere 620GP - see link https://www.deere.com.au/en/motor-graders/620g-gp-motor-grader/
  • See attached spec sheet - we are just finalising these spec sheets now which will go on the website. You can use for now and I can update once finalised.


Hino Tipper Truck
  • Hino 300 Series - https://www.hino.com.au/300/300-series/ here is the specific model 616 AT 2525 STD https://www.hino.com.au/uploads/pdf/specification/300-series/hsmy20616std-0720%20web.pdf
  • You have created a draft for the Hino for us, thank you. However this will need to go into separate section (like the grader needing a new section) - spec sheet attached - note we are just finalising these spec sheets. You can use for now and I can update once finalised.


Case Dozer 2050M (please note that the Dozer needs to go in as a new section under hire equipment):
  • This is being specced up with the RAM badging as we speak. I will send through more details of this soon. I don't have a spec sheet yet.
  • spec link - https://www.casece.com/apac/en-anz/products/crawler-dozers/m-series-crawler-dozers/models/2050m



Dynapac CC1200 double drum vibratory roller - I'll send through more info for this soon. There are a few more updates that need to be made for this one.



Thank you!


Peta
